data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of America.
In the minute 1, Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick America.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 3, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! San Luis have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Ramiro Gonzalez.
Great play from Pablo Barrera to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, In San Luis de Potosi America's Federico Vinas is caught offside.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Free kick for America in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, America have a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 14, Throw-in America.
Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in San Luis's half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, America's Sebastian Caceres attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 18, Jorge Perez awards San Luis a goal kick.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
America to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 23, Free kick for America in the half of San Luis.
Emanuel Aguilera for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 25, San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
San Luis's Matias Catalan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for America at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, America have been awarded a penalty...
Emanuel Aguilera scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 34, Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
America to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 36, Jorge Perez signals a San Luis throw-in in America's half.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick America.
In the minute 37, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 41, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of America.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 42, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 45, America are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 45, Free kick for America in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in San Luis de Potosi.
Jorge Perez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Can America capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sebastian Cordova's header is off-target for America.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for America at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 49, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Goal! Henry Martin heads America into a 1-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Alonso Escoboza.
In the minute 51, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis.
Richard Sanchez (America) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from America.
In the minute 55, Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for America, close to San Luis's area.
Jorge Perez awards San Luis a goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 57, Henry Martin of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Enrique Lopez with Dionicio Escalante. This is the first substitution made today by Guillermo Vazquez.
Renato Mendoza is replacing Jorge Sanchez for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of America.
Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 60, Guillermo Vazquez is making the team's third substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Diego Pineda replacing Camilo Mayada.
In the minute 61, Free kick America.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for America in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 63, America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
German Berterame (San Luis) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis to take a throw-in in America territory.
Miguel Herrera (America) is making a first substitution, with Sergio Diaz replacing Richard Sanchez.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for San Luis in the half of America.
San Luis's Nicolas Ibanez is on target but unsuccessful.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 69, San Luis to take a throw-in in America territory.
San Luis drive upfield and Renato Mendoza gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a America defender.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 71, San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 72, Rodrigo Noya (San Luis) has received a first yellow card.
America push forward at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez and Sebastian Cordova gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined San Luis defence.
Anderson Julio is on a sub for Pablo Barrera for San Luis.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for America in the half of San Luis.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis's Anderson Julio breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for America at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Jorge Perez signals a America throw-in in San Luis's half.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 77, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
America are pushing forward but Ruben Gonzalez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 78, Can San Luis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside America's half?
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis.
Antonio Lopez Amenabar is replacing Sebastian Cordova for America at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 83, America pushes forward through Henry Martin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
San Luis push upfield but Jorge Perez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 84, Miguel Herrera (America) is making a third substitution, with Emilio Sanchez replacing Alonso Escoboza.
Miguel Herrera is making the team's fourth substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Luis Reyes replacing Federico Vinas.
The home team replace Rodrigo Noya with Pablo Lopez.
In the minute 86, Free kick for America in their own half.
Free kick San Luis.
German Berterame is booked for the home team.
In the minute 88, Throw-in high up the field for America in San Luis de Potosi.
Emilio Sanchez of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
America needs to be cautious. San Luis have an attacking throw-in.
America's Henry Martin gets in a shot on goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
San Luis have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
